  <title>1961CT_polygon</title>
  <abstract>Shapefile was digitized from georeferenced map 1961 census tracts: metropolitan Toronto planning area (G 3524 T6E2 63 1961). Boundaries were initially vectorized into polylines with ArcScan; these outlines were used to guide tracing of census tract polygons, snapping to edges of 2006 census tracts where boundaries remained the same. 1961 census tabular data can be joined via the CTUID field. 

1961 City of Toronto census tract shapefile developed for GIS analysis.</abstract>
